name: Elle (iagolucchese)
description:
Student game at Feevale University, third semester. 

A mix of Celeste and Child of Light.

Programming and Level Design: 
Iago Bueno Lucchese

Cutscenes, Character Concepts and Design: 
Kassiana Fritz

Character Animations: 
Kassiana Fritz, Nahuel Alvarez

Scenario Concepts and Design:
Melissa M. Barcellos

3D Assets, Animations, and Video Editing:
Nahuel Alvarez

Sounds and Music are Royalty Free
